table.name: vtiger_discounts
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_discounts` ( `discountsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `discountsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `discqty` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `discprice` decimal(11,8) DEFAULT NULL, `disctotal` decimal(16,8) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`discountsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_discountscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_discountscf` ( `discountsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`discountsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
